trans-unit.source: Represents a context that is set up during workflow activation using the workflow hosting endpoint to handle arguments, and receive workflow completion notifications.
trans-unit.target: 表示在工作流激活过程中使用工作流托管终结点设置的上下文，用于处理自变量和接收工作流完成通知。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the workflow instance should be suspended or run after creation..
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在创建工作流实例之后是应挂起该实例还是应运行该实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow instance is suspended after it is created ; <see langword="false" /> if the workflow is run after it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果该工作流实例在创建之后被挂起，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该工作流在创建之后运行，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnBeginWorkflowCompleted(System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Exception,System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method is called in a transaction..
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事务中调用 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnBeginWorkflowCompleted(System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Exception,System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a completion transaction is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要完成事务，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 中止 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnAbort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnAbort%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The state of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例的状态。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain output generated by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流实例生成的输出的键/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: If present, an error that caused the workflow to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 导致工作流终止的错误（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The time interval during which the asynchronous operation must complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在此时间内完成异步操作的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The location in an application to which control returns when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作完成时将控制权返回到的应用程序中的位置。

trans-unit.source: User-defined state.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的状态。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to perform workflow instance completion notification.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步操作以执行工作流实例完成通知。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the workflow instance associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" /> completes.
trans-unit.target: 当与此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" /> 关联的工作流实例完成时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this operation to perform custom actions on workflow instance completion.
trans-unit.target: 派生类可覆盖此操作以针对工作流实例的完成事件执行自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnBeginWorkflowCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnBeginWorkflowCompleted%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation that notifies workflow instance completion associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 完成用于通知与此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext" /> 关联的工作流实例完成的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a simple implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnEndWorkflowCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnEndWorkflowCompleted%2A> 方法的简单实现。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the base class <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnAbort%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，调用了基类 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnAbort%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the arguments passed to the newly created workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递给新创建的工作流实例的自变量。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of key/value pair arguments to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例的键/值对参数的字典。
